title: Yewon Kang
text:
I’m a PhD student in Educational Psychology at the University of Minnesota.
I’m fascinated by how people make sense of information in today’s digital world, and how AI can help. In the Reading + Learning Lab, where I work with Dr. Panayiota Kendeou. I’m currently studying how students use AI to build knowledge and better understand complex texts.
Beyond research, I’m the Instructional Technology Fellow for the School of Social Work. I work directly with faculty, guiding them in leveraging technology to enhance teaching and develop accessible, engaging course sites.




Digital and online reading comprehension

AI-supported learning

Information and source evaluation
